name: simplicite
description: Simplicite(R) platform Javascript API (for node.js and browser)

scripts.doc: jsdoc -t node_modules/docdash -d docs src/simplicite.mjs USAGE.md && replace '#fc83ff' '#98cbff' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#6d426d' '#2e76bd' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#CA79CA' '#edb8b8' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#606' '#094e93' docs/styles/jsdoc.css

author: Simplicite Software <contact@simplicitesoftware.com> (http://www.simplicitesoftware.com/)
